alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Lincoln; McClain; Pontotoc; Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Garvin, western Seminole, southern Lincoln, northwestern Pontotoc, Pottawatomie and southeastern McClain Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Shawnee to 3 miles west of Asher to near Vanoss. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Seminole, Tecumseh, McLoud, Prague, Pink, Stratford, Konawa, Byng, Meeker, Maud, Earlsboro, Bowlegs, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, Byars, Johnson, Sparks, and St. Louis. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 174 and 202. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Garvin; Lincoln; McClain; Pontotoc; Pottawatomie; Seminole
